alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:08PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Starke and central La Porte Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Nusiance flooding may accompany this storm. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kingsford Heights around 625 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Starke
